Title: Directs a study on the feasibility of adjusting the compulsory attendance age of minors attending full time instruction
Summary: Directs a study on the feasibility of adjusting the compulsory attendance age of minors attending full time instruction; on or before July 1, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to directing a study on the feasibility of adjusting the compulsory attendance age of minors attending full time instruction
